aiGenerationMetadata.appInitialisationPrompt:
You are a senior full-stack system architect and backend engineer with experience building production-grade university-scale systems.
You design for performance, security, scalability, and clarity.
Assume this project will be reviewed by strict professors and real institutions.

Project Overview

Build UNIManager, a University Management System that can handle 1000+ concurrent users, secure role-based access, and clean admin workflows.

The system must be modular, scalable, and well-documented.

Tech Stack (STRICT)
Backend

Python

FastAPI

Async-first design

REST API (clean, versioned)

Frontend

Next.js (App Router)

React

Tailwind CSS

Server Components where possible

Clean dashboard UI

Auth & Security

Clerk Authentication

JWT-based session handling

RBAC (Role-Based Access Control)

Database

PostgreSQL

SQLAlchemy (async)

Alembic migrations

Deployment Ready

Environment-based config

Production-safe patterns

Docker-compatible structure

User Roles (RBAC)

Implement strict RBAC middleware with the following roles:

1. Super Admin

Full system control

Create colleges/departments

Manage all users

View system-wide analytics

2. Admin (College / Department)

Manage faculty & students

Assign subjects

Approve results

View department analytics

3. Faculty

Upload attendance

Upload internal marks

View assigned classes

Download reports

4. Student

View profile

View attendance

View marks

Download hall tickets & reports

RBAC must be enforced both on backend routes and frontend UI.

Core Modules
Authentication

Clerk sign-in / sign-up

Role stored in backend DB

Middleware validates role per request

User Management

Sync Clerk user â†’ backend user

Assign roles

Disable / enable accounts

Academic Management

Courses

Departments

Subjects

Semester mapping

Attendance System

Daily attendance

Faculty-only upload

Student read-only

Percentage auto-calculation

Marks & Results

Internal marks

Semester results

GPA calculation

PDF report generation

Admin Dashboard

Total students

Attendance stats

Pass/fail analytics

Department-wise breakdown

Backend Requirements

FastAPI project structure

Dependency injection

RBAC dependency (Depends)

Async DB queries

Pagination for large lists

Centralized error handling

OpenAPI docs enabled

Include:

Folder structure

Example models

Example RBAC middleware

Sample API routes

Sample response schemas

Frontend Requirements

Next.js App Router structure

Clerk middleware for route protection

Role-based layouts

Dashboard per role

API integration layer

Loading & error states

Include:

Folder structure

Example protected route

Example dashboard page

RBAC-based UI rendering

Performance & Scale

Design assuming:

1000+ concurrent users

Heavy read operations

Safe writes for attendance & marks

Future expansion (fees, exams, LMS)

Documentation

Generate:

Setup instructions

Environment variables

Local dev steps

API usage notes

Output Format (IMPORTANT)

System architecture overview

Backend folder structure

Frontend folder structure

RBAC design explanation

Key code snippets (backend + frontend)

Database schema overview

Future improvements

Tone & Quality Bar

Clean

Professional

No shortcuts

No toy examples

Production mindset only
